document.full_text: for a town with a winter population of 4,000, even one that is famed for its broad beaches and summertime sun, deauville offers an inordinate amount of luxury.
document.title: special report: g-8: a french town's bright shine belies its size
lines_and_colors: for a town with a winter population of 4,000, even one that is famed for its broad beaches and summertime sun, deauville offers an inordinate amount of luxury.
